Author: dostoyefski
Text: So sorry you’re going through this!  Please be careful with the cutting, if you can’t stop then try and at least make sure you’re using clean instruments; my former therapist told me to do this to prevent me from getting tetanus.  It sounds like you’re having a pretty tough time, do you think it might be time to reach out for help? I won’t make any assumptions but it sounds like there’s more than just disordered eating going on here. Sometimes even opening up to a friend can do a lot of good  Whatever you do, please try and stay safe!
